tweet:
Trump broke the law.

Ever since he got caught, he has been trying to cover it up.

The White House is putting pressure on the intelligence community to not cooperate with Congress.

This is obstruction of Congress - an assault on our democracy. https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.politico.com/amp/news/2020/01/19/adam-schiff-nsa-cia-ukraine-info-100952 …

Will Republicans be loyal to Trump or the Constitution?

@senatemajld, the American people are waiting for an answer. https://twitter.com/cnnpolitics/status/1218792736914132992 …

Trump abused his power when he invited foreign interference in our elections for personal gain, jeopardizing our national security, the integrity of our elections, and our democracy.

When he got caught, he tried covering it up by obstructing Congress. https://thehill.com/homenews/house/478947-read-house-impeachment-managers-trial-brief …

Sintonicen este domingo para mi entrevista con @jorgeramosnews sobre mi rol con una de las siete #ImpeachmentManagers en el juicio político en el Senado contra Donald J. Trump. https://twitter.com/alpunto/status/1218593899477782528 …

Here’s your weekly update! As many of you now know, I’m one of the seven #ImpeachmentManagers for the Senate Impeachment Trial against Trump.

With the Constitution on our side, we’ll hold him accountable and ensure we pass on the gift of democracy to the next generation. pic.twitter.com/Xdv0SjNuAc

Great to join Houston @LULAC for its Chorizo & Menudo breakfast and to be with mi gente.

Appreciate your oraciones and well wishes as I work to hold this President accountable during the Senate Impeachment trial.

Los americanos saben lo que es un juicio justo. Significa:

✅Testigos

✅Documentos

✅Evidencia

¿Son fieles a Trump o la Constitución?

Los americanos merecen una respuesta.

Quieren un juicio justo.

Americans know what it means to have a fair trial. It means:

✅Witnesses

✅Documents

✅Evidence

GOP Senators will need to answer one simple question.

Are you loyal to Trump or the Constitution?

Americans deserve an answer. 

They want a fair trial. https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/15/politics/congress-impeachment-fight/index.html …
Tenemos que exigir justicia para toda la gente en la frontera. https://twitter.com/JoaquinCastrotx/status/1218240896149458951 …

La Constitución como nuestra guía, vamos a presentar nuestro caso y la verdad para la gente Americana.

I’m humbled to be one of the seven  House #ImpeachmentManagers and take seriously my solemn duty to uphold and defend the Constitution.

The Constitution as our guide, we will make our case and present the truth to the American people. pic.twitter.com/5OwThgktZx

And we’ll present the truth to the American people. pic.twitter.com/AGawKrGjJM

Honored to be one of seven House Impeachment Managers who’ll be making the case to the American people.

For me this is about upholding my oath of office.

I take my responsibility seriously because we’re working to defend our Constitution at a pivotal moment in our democracy.
